name: MasterCook Ingredients File
summary: An ING file contains a list of ingredients for ValuSoft MasterCook, an app that organizes cookbooks, meal calendars, shopping lists, and more. It stores detailed information about ingredients, such as names, quantities, and nutritional data, which users can reference in the app when creating or organizing recipes. MasterCook uses ING files to manage ingredient lists and ensure consistency across recipes within the program.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
